entry.content:

but it will remain
a fervent mirage

blueprint in a frame
fragile as morning clouds
like dew on lotus leaves
like dew on lotus leaves, my dear

millions of stars
millions of suns
wake up without memories now

millions of stars
millions of suns
shed their salving light upon our secret world

the ghosts in the night
whisper our names
and we will live on in their dreams

we do not exist
but I will hold on
try to regain

we will set like the sun
and you don't even know my face
you and me, in hiding
until we're swimming home

millions of stars

wake up without memories now

millions of stars
millions of suns

entry.title: Subsignal - The Colossus That Bestrode The World - 가사

link.title: Subsignal - The Colossus That Bestrode The World - 가사

entry.content:
thousands of years I was watching
over the plains and the sands
eternal smile on my lips

I was announcing peace
with unassuming grace
while people looked up to me

then came a faith
raping all signs
all in its way

you can erase a thing of worth
while you can't cast out its truth
you can negate and violate all over again
you can collapse an icon and wipe out its light
but you cannot erase the one eternal smile

hundreds of years on an old shelf
knowledge and culture preserved
in a word some won't ever conceive
then came a hidebound hand
raping the deathless page
it happens every day

you can erase a word of truth
while you can't cast out its worth
you can negate and violate all over again
you can collapse a bright star and wipe out its light
but you cannot erase the one eternal word

what you wish for

is it maybe something that you someday hope to get
this stinging insight that the sum of you will never make a perfect match

you're the lungs when I am gasping for some air to breath
like a spell that brings the sun and brings the rain, anything goes

a giant leap of faith
